value.title: India’s Snabbit valuation doubled to $180M in 5 months on its quick house-help bet
value.content: Snabbit has raised its third funding round in nine months.

value.title: Cluely’s Roy Lee on the ragebait strategy for startup marketing
value.content: Cluely's Roy Lee has a message for startup founders: you should be thinking harder about how to go viral.

value.title: NBA champion Tristan Thompson and World Mobile launch community-owned network Uplift
value.content: With Uplift, every subscription will contribute to neighborhood-level network expansion, while local hosts that are known as "AirNode operators" will earn a portion of network revenue by providing community coverage.

value.title: Digg founder Kevin Rose on the need for trusted social communities in the AI era
value.content: Now again under Rose's control, the new Digg is creating a place for people to socialize and connect online within communities, similar to Reddit, but it has different ideas about how such a platform should work at a time when bots are nearly indistinguishable from humans.

value.title: YouTube announces ‘voluntary exit program’ for US staff
value.content: YouTube CEO Neal Mohan told employees about the program via an internal memo on Wednesday.

value.title: And the winner of Startup Battlefield at Disrupt 2025 is: Glīd
value.content: Glīd, which is trying to streamline cargo container logistics, has beaten out 199 other Startup Battlefield companies to take home $100,000.

value.title: Solana co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko is a big fan of agentic coding
value.content: Speaking at TechCrunch Disrupt, Yakovenko said he's become increasingly comfortable taking a back seat in software development tasks.

value.title: 2024’s Startup Battlefield runner-up geCKo Materials reveals four new products at TechCrunch Disrupt
value.content: geCKo Materials returned to the stage at TechCrunch Disrupt to debut new products as it pushes deeper into commercializing its tech.

value.title: Box CEO Aaron Levie on how AI is changing the enterprise SaaS landscape
value.content: He painted a picture of a future of enterprise software where the SaaS is used for the core business workflow, and then the agents ride on top of that.

value.title: San Francisco mayor: ‘We should be the testbed for emerging tech’
value.content: While San Francisco's mayor Daniel Lurie is opening his arms to autonomous vehicles, other cities are more resistant. Boston, for instance, has considered a ban on autonomous vehicles in the city.

value.title: Microsoft Azure is down, affecting 365, Xbox, Minecraft, and others
value.content: Microsoft Azure is facing a significant outage, with services affected like Microsoft 365, Xbox, and Minecraft.

value.title: GM cuts thousands of EV and battery factory workers
value.content: The automaker has been on a tear of cuts to its workforce and will idle two battery factories for the first half of 2026.

value.title: Former L3Harris Trenchant boss pleads guilty to selling zero-day exploits to Russian broker
value.content: Prosecutors confirmed Peter Williams, the former Trenchant boss, sold eight exploits to a Russian buyer. TechCrunch exclusively reported that the Trenchant division was investigating a leak of its hacking tools, after another employee was accused of involvement.

value.title: Google to bring shuttered nuclear power plant back from the dead
value.content: Google is working with NextEra to reopen the Duane Arnold Energy Center in Iowa to power the tech company's data centers.

value.title: Bending Spoons to acquire AOL
value.content: Wednesday's news marks a new chapter for AOL, which was once one of the most recognized brands on the internet, known for its email service and "You've Got Mail" notification.

value.title: ElevenLabs CEO says AI audio models will be ‘commoditized’ over time
value.content: ElevenLabs' founder Mati Staniszewski said that, in the short term, AI audio models were still the "biggest advantage and the biggest step change you can have today."

value.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025: How to watch the Startup Battlefield finale, Cluely, Solana, SF’s mayor
value.content: If you’re not able to attend in person, the next best thing is to check out our livestream of the Disrupt Stage. Tune in right here starting now!

value.title: It’s official: Fubo is combining with Hulu Live TV
value.content: Fubo and Disney have officially completed the transaction to combine the live sports platform with Hulu Live TV.

value.title: How AI labs use Mercor to get the data companies won’t share
value.content: Mercor CEO Brendan Foody has built a $10 billion empire freeing up valuable data from legacy industries and making it available to AI labs.

value.title: Nvidia becomes first public company worth $5 trillion
value.content: With a market cap of $5 trillion, Nvidia is now worth more than the aggregated stock markets of all countries, apart from the United States, China, and Japan.
